name: leguminous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to refer to a plant that has its seeds in a pod, such as the bean or pea: leguminous plants The soybean seed is the most important leguminous food in the world. See
legume
More examplesFewer examplesFenugreek is a leguminous plant from western Asia.Like many leguminous crops, pulses play a key role in crop rotation.There are rows of dried leguminous things past their eat-by date.
